data.title: PM’s popularity above 50% but government’s rating falls in November
data.description: Survey shows score was lower on several indices than in October

data.title: Five districts in Phatthalung still battling floods after heavy rains
data.description: Slow drainage of water into Songkhla Lake blamed for the situation

data.title: Energy Ministry working to tackle gas, fuel shortage in South: Pirapan
data.description: Minister attributes rerouting of transportation due to flooding for the delay

data.title: India imposes anti-dumping duty on import of ECH from Thailand
data.description: Thai exporters have appealed against the claim that the import of Epichlorohydrin was affecting local industry

data.title: Cool to cold weather to persist in most parts of Thailand
data.description: Southern monsoon weakening, but lower South to receive heavy rains

data.title: UNAIDS report: Upholding human rights is key to ending the AIDS pandemic
data.description: Asia Pacific seeks to lower HIV-related stigma and rights violations through education about U=U

data.title: Online scams related to charity and aid activities ‘a serious problem’
data.description: NESDC report flags social issue that exploits people’s compassion

data.title: How to save up to 5 hours weekly with Car Call App and Pre-Booking
data.description: Bangkok’s traffic congestion ranks 12th globally and tops Asia, per INRIX. Thailand leads as the world’s most traffic-congested country. Bangkok residents face 64.1 hours of delays annually, incurring 5.5 billion baht in fuel costs each year.

data.title: Bangchak launches 14th Greenovative Forum, highlighting AI for sustainability
data.description: Bangchak, in partnership with The Standard, hosted the 14th Greenovative Forum at True Digital Park West to mark its 40th anniversary. Titled "Crafting Tomorrow’s Future with Sustainable Energy and AI," experts discussed AI's role in a sustainable energy future.

data.title: Southeast Asia businesses battle more than 24M on-device threats in H1 2024
data.description: On-device threats stem from malware via USB drives, CDs, DVDs, or files entering systems in non-open forms like encrypted files or complex installers. Kaspersky detected and blocked over 24M such threats in Southeast Asia during the first half of 2024.

data.title: Thai government donates 3M baht in aid to UN for refugees and displaced people
data.description: At a ceremony at the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, Thailand confirmed 1M baht contributions to UNICEF, UNHCR, and WFP. The funds will support these UN agencies in delivering essential aid to refugees and forcibly displaced populations worldwide.

data.title: Public health depends on human rights
data.description: As a trained HIV physician, it has been inspiring to witness the steady development of ever-more effective treatments for HIV. The continual expansion of proven HIV prevention tools has resulted in lifesaving benefits for so many people.

data.title: Kaspersky: Southeast Asia businesses battle more than 24M on-device threats in H1 2024
data.description: On-device or local, threat incidents are caused by malware spread via removable USB drives, CDs and DVDs, or by files that initially made their way onto the computer in non-open form (for example, programs in complex installers, encrypted files, etc.) Companies in Southeast Asia encountered more than 24 million on-device threats in the first six months of 2024. From January to June this year, Kaspersky Business Solutions detected and blocked 24,289,901 threats of this kind

data.title: Ethnic Tai Yai people celebrate traditional New Year
data.description: Event organised by Tai Yai Ethnic Association marks beginning of the Tai Yai lunar calendar

data.title: NESDC calls for urgent action to manage EV battery waste
data.description: While electric vehicles are touted as eco-friendly solution, their batteries pose  significant environmental challenge if not handled responsibly

data.title: Nearly 5 million Thai children and youth are gamblers, study reveals
data.description: Scholars caution against establishment of entertainment complexes and casinos

data.title: Myanmar vessel attacks Thai fishing boats: one killed, 31 captured
data.description: Thai patrol boat arrived at scene to assist, transported injured to Ranong

data.title: Thailand secures historic free-trade agreement with EFTA
data.description: Significant milestone in Thailand's trade history as its first FTA with European countries

data.title: DSI summary on PTT-OR corruption case is fake news, agency says
data.description: Investigation into fraud allegations is not yet over, DSI says

data.title: Nation Foundation cooks up meals for flood victims in Hat Yai
data.description: Food will be delivered to communities in Hat Yai district, Songkhla province, that have been hit by floods this week

data.title: Drug crackdown at the border: the Wa issue
data.description: Thai government faces challenges destroying drug production sites and safe houses in minority-dominated border areas

data.title: Thailand gears up for petroleum exploration in Andaman Sea
data.description: Government looks to tap alternative resources as talks with Cambodia yet to take off
